name: Trou, the Giant of the Fairie's Stronghold
text:
Break: Put this card into your hand.
While this card is a summon spell, players cannot chase cards with total cost 4 or less.
Continuous: This card cannot be targeted by spells with total cost 4 or less or abilities on a card with total cost 4 or less.
Continuous: At the end of your recovery phase, pay GG2 or put this card on the bottom of your main deck.
Continuous: Other resonators gain [+100/+100] for each resonator in your field
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
